name: Overclocked
description: Overclocked is a free-flowing action game that blends combat and platforming to create a fluid and rhythmic experience. Take on the role of Amber, a glass-cannon vigilante, as you fight to uncover a plot that threatens to tear your home apart.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
